Name: Ningguang
Title: "Eclipsing Star" Ningguang
Desc: The greatest secret she keeps is that she keeps a great many of Liyue's secrets.
Source: Reward for inviting Ningguang to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

C116011.Name: Jade Screen
C116011.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When your active character receives at least 2 DMG: </color>Decrease DMG taken by 1.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 2</color>

K3.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>
K3.Desc: After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.\nThis card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usages</color> remaining.

16013.Name: Starshatter
16013.Desc: Deals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT]. If <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C116011]</color> is on the field, deals +2 DMG.
